translation_english: I have done / I did; I have made / I made
notes: auxiliary 'avere'; participle does not agree with subject gender/number

translation_english: you have done / you did; you have made / you made

translation_english: he/she/it has done / did; has made / made

translation_english: you (plural) have done / you (plural) did; you (plural) have made / you (plural) made

translation_english: they have done / they did; they have made / they made
notes: auxiliary 'avere'; participle does not agree with subject gender/number
